## Resources.ResourceBuilder.setResourceType() method

Sets the resource type for the resource being built. Fails if a resource type has already been set and it does not match the new resource type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setResourceType(resourceTypeName: string): Result<ResourceBuilder>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

resourceTypeName


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The name of the resource type to set.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Result&lt;[ResourceBuilder](./ts-res.resources.resourcebuilder.md)<!-- -->&gt;

`Success` with the updated [ResourceBuilder](./ts-res.resources.resourcebuilder.md) object if successful, or `Failure` with an error message if not.
